abstract: GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. (AP) — The nation’s largest chemical company, Dow Chemical, said on Tuesday that its fourth-quarter earnings fell 52 percent because of an overhaul effort and a $1.7 billion jump in spending on materials and energy.
snippet: GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. (AP) — The nation’s largest chemical company, Dow Chemical, said on Tuesday that its fourth-quarter earnings fell 52 percent because of an overhaul effort and a $1.7 billion jump in spending on materials and energy.
lead_paragraph: GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. (AP)  The nation’s largest chemical company, Dow Chemical, said on Tuesday that its fourth-quarter earnings fell 52 percent because of an overhaul effort and a $1.7 billion jump in spending on materials and energy.

abstract: The Dow gained more than 100 points within minutes of the central bank’s announcement and continued to climb before falling just before the close.
snippet: The Dow gained more than 100 points within minutes of the central bank’s announcement and continued to climb before falling just before the close.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street watched a Fed rally abruptly fizzle on Wednesday, as excitement over an interest rate cut gave way to concern about a new round of problems related to the subprime mortgage crisis.
